thread.section_title: GO Rentals New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GO Rentals New Zealand | www.gorentals.co.nz
thread.title: Jenni
thread.title_full: GO Rentals New Zealand reviewed by Jenni

author: Jenni
title: Jenni
text: As a woman I was expecting a hard sell going on past experiences with other car hire companies in other countries. Instead the staff were so helpful and just explained all the different cars that would match my needs and the different insurance options. There was never any pressure to take any extras or anything other than a small car that was perfect for what I wanted. The staff were friendly and kind and helped to make the whole process very easy. The car itself was clean and well maintained and the drop off was easy and hassle free. I'm returning to New Zealand next year and I'll definitely be hiring from Go Rentals again.
